Description.Text: We look forward to greeting you in the new InterCityHotel Leipzig from the spring of 2013.

Located in the immediate vicinity of the main station and the city centre, the new InterCityHotel Leipzig looks forward to greeting its guests. All places of interests can be reached comfortably by foot or tram. The Leipziger Messe, the exhibition centre, and the Congress Center Leipzig (CCL) can be reached quickly by public transportation.

The 166 rooms of the InterCityHotel Leipzig, with their modern colour concept, ensure pleasant comfort. All of the rooms of the InterCityHotel Leipzig are equipped with soundproofed windows, so that, even in the midst of a pulsating city centre, our guests can stay and sleep in peace. There are two rooms available suitable for disabled persons and which can be accessed by wheelchair.

The restaurant of the InterCityHotel Leipzig possesses a modern ambience, bathed in light. Our guests can look forward to a sumptuous breakfast buffet with various types of bread and rolls, cold meat and cheese specialities, muesli, fresh fruit and juices, coffee and tea. In the evening the restaurant offers a selection of regional specialities and national dishes. BistroLounge - The ideal meeting point for a business meeting or a pleasant pause with cold and hot snacks, cake and biscuits fresh from the oven and a large selection of drinks and coffee specialities.
